content: Hi everyone! I've been using Rust for a couple of months now, both for hobby projects and I even convinced my boss to try it at work. I'm interested in exploring WASM and I've experimented with it a bit but I have tons of questions. What is the best/most natural place where to ask WASM questions without spamming too many people and reaching the right ones? I saw links to #WG-wasm discord channel but that doesn't seem to exist (or doesn't show up for me).
It should be under "domain working groups" Screenshot-2020-10-02-at-17.56.56.png
There's also a WebAssembly Discord server which has a #rust channel

Thank you @Teymour Aldridge and @DPC , I managed to find it on Discord. My problem was that the link to wg-wasm I found on Gloo was showing a Discord error (error loading messages). Following a Discord link from rustwasm pointed to "accept the code of conduct". I could then see wg-wasm. The Gloo link also started working now.
